articles.description: Homelander is on the defensive and doing some major damage control in The Boys’ first season 3 trailer ahead of its June 3rd premiere.
articles.content: Its a bird, its a plane, its a murderous psychopath

articles.title: Rust producer hopes movie will be completed with Alec Baldwin - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: "Many of those who were involved hope to honor Halyna by completing her last work, but at this point, it is just hope," says producer Anjul Nigam.
articles.content: UPDATE: Anjul Nigam, a producer on the Western Rust with Alec Baldwin, clarified his earlier comment about finishing the film in a statement to EW, saying, "My statement that I was confident the film… [+2224 chars]
